stories.title: Team Mode Detection & Configuration
stories.description: Developer can configure Hodge for team vs solo workflow with appropriate settings applied automatically. Includes config detection, init command updates, gitignore management, and tests for both modes.

stories.title: PM-Required Feature Creation
stories.description: Team mode enforces PM ID validation and provides clear guidance when IDs are missing or invalid. Includes validation logic, explore command checks, error messaging, and tests.

stories.title: Conflict Resolution Tooling
stories.description: Developers have commands and documentation to handle inevitable merge conflicts. Includes hodge resolve command, pre-commit hooks, conflict docs, and tests.

stories.title: Enhanced PM Sync for Team Visibility
stories.description: PM issues show rich progress updates (comments, blockers, commits) giving teams visibility. Includes PM comment appending, blocker status updates, refine command hooks, and tests.

stories.title: Feature ID Abstraction & Refactoring
stories.description: Codebase supports both HODGE-XXX (solo) and PM IDs (team) transparently. Includes FeatureIDService abstraction, refactoring 641 occurrences, path updates, and backward compatibility tests.

stories.description: Developers use streamlined workflow with /explore (high-level) and /refine (details) with blocker detection. Includes template updates, /refine command creation, /decide removal, blocker logic, refinements.md structure, and tests.
